official_title: To suspend for a three-year period the duty on composite vials of timolol maleate/pilocarpine hydrochloride solutions and diluent.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, for a three-year period, the duty on composite vials of timolol maleate/pilocarpine hydrochloride solutions and diluent.

titles.title: To suspend for a three-year period the duty on composite vials of timolol maleate/pilocarpine hydrochloride solutions and diluent.
